page.title: 06WINDY ARBOUR FARM
page.content: {Windy Arbour farm}is a very large farm,with 200 acres. The crops they grow on the farm are mainly vegetables like potatoes, sprouts, carrots and cabbages. All the crops they grow are sold in the farmshop. In the shop they have lots of food including tinned food, crisps, drinks, sweets, jam, eggs, cakes, biscuits and so on. The farm used to keep animals but they don't have them anymore. To keep all of the crops growing they needed plenty of machinery. They had 4 tractors, 2 forklift trucks, 1 combine harvester, sprayers and quite a lot more.The farmshop opens from{9a.m. to {6p.m.}and in one week{1,500}people at an average guess visited the shop. The farm was built in 1895. the farm used to have plenty of animals, but it has changed and has no animals now. The shop and farm are very popular.
